name: Grrrs on the moon
description:
All controls are with the mouse.

Pick your Grrr and defend the moon.  It's a game of how long you can survive and how many aliens you can kill.  Your upgrades can turn you into a bit of a God.

Only the first 11 Grrrs have unique superpowers I'm afraid (from top left) .  I ran out of time.  Oh and there seems to be a sound bug when switching scenes in chrome.

This was a lot of fun to make.  I finally got to use my Grrr sprites in a Jam :)  Ships and bee splash was made by AI (Midjourney)

I hope you love it :)
